Question: What does ProWoo Engineering Solutions do?

Question: What is included in ProWoo’s project lifecycle?
Answer: ProWoo’s project lifecycle includes: Phase 1 – Concept Development (Feasibility & Concept Studies, Field Development, Economic Analysis), Phase 2 – Design & Engineering (Basic Engineering, FEED, Detailed Design), Phase 3 – Execute/EPC (Project Management, Start-up & Commissioning, Plant Operating Manuals), Phase 4 – Operate (Production System Optimization, Revamp Studies, Facility Debottlenecking & Modifications).
Keywords: phases lifecycle design execution operation prowoo projects
